did.head: Descriptive Summary

did.physdesc: This collection consists of three items.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p:
See the
University of Virginia Library’s use policy.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Papers of the Washington Family, Accession #2988-c, Special Collections Dept., University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: These documents were given to the Library on April 5, 1993, by Frank Grizzard, Papers of George Washington, Alderman Library, who retains possession of the originals.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of electrostatic copies of three items pertaining to the Washington family, 1752-1816, including journal entries concerning the estate of Lawrence Washington, 1773-1781, a suit of chancery brought before the Greenbrier County Court by [Lawrence ?] A. Washington, plaintiff, against George W.P. Custis, Bushrod Washington, George Washington, and others, defendants, August 1816, and an account of Samuel Harestone with John Harvie, 1752-1756.
